001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Dates;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.BolusPermissionResponse;
012import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.RemoteCarbEntryResponse;
013import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.TimeSinceResetResponse;
014
015/**
016 * Saves the entered carbs as a history log entry which populates it in the pump's graph.
017 * If not called, then the bolus appears in the mobile app / t:connect without the carb amount.
018 *
019 * pumpTime is the ACTUAL pump time seconds since boot, and can be returned from a TimeSinceResetResponse
020 * via {@link TimeSinceResetResponse#getPumpTimeSecondsSinceReset()}
021 *
022 * This should be called before {@link InitiateBolusRequest}
023 */
024/**
025 * Saves the entered carbs as a history log entry which populates it in the pump's graph.
026 * If not called, then the bolus appears in the mobile app / t:connect without the carb amount.
027 *
028 * pumpTime is the ACTUAL pump time seconds since boot, and can be returned from a TimeSinceResetResponse
029 * via {@link TimeSinceResetResponse#getPumpTimeSecondsSinceReset()}
030 *
031 * This should be called before {@link InitiateBolusRequest}
032 *
033
034 *
035 * <br>
036 *
037 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.RemoteCarbEntryResponse}, opCode -14, size 9
038 *
039 * <br>
040 *
041 * 
042 * <table border='1'>
043 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
044 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-14</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
045 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>9</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
046 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
047 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CONTROL}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
048 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.RemoteCarbEntryResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
049 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>signed</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
050 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>minApi</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion#API_V2_5}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
051 * </table>
052 */@MessageProps(
053    opCode=-14,
054    size=9, // 33 with 24 byte padding
055    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
056    characteristic=Characteristic.CONTROL,
057    response=RemoteCarbEntryResponse.class,
058    signed=true,
059    minApi=KnownApiVersion.API_V2_5
060)
061public class RemoteCarbEntryRequest extends Message {
062    private int carbs;
063    private int unknown;
064    private long pumpTime;
065    private int bolusId;
066
067    public RemoteCarbEntryRequest() {}
068
069    /**
070     * Creates a request to affix information on the given number of carbs (in grams) to the
071     * bolus ID (which must be in progress; in a state between calling {@link BolusPermissionRequest}
072     * and {@link InitiateBolusRequest})
073     * @param carbs the number of carbs in grams
074     * @param pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot the output of {@link TimeSinceResetResponse#getPumpTimeSecondsSinceReset()}
075     * @param bolusId the bolus ID returned from {@link BolusPermissionResponse#getBolusId()}
076     */
077    public RemoteCarbEntryRequest(int carbs, long pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot, int bolusId) {
078        this(carbs, 1, pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot, bolusId);
079    }
080
081    public RemoteCarbEntryRequest(int carbs, int unknown, long pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot, int bolusId) {
082        Validate.isTrue(pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot < Dates.JANUARY_1_2008_UNIX_EPOCH, "pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot ("+pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot+") should be seconds since boot; a unix epoch was provided instead");
083        this.cargo = buildCargo(carbs, unknown, pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot, bolusId);
084        this.carbs = carbs;
085        this.unknown = unknown; // from examples, always 1
086        this.pumpTime = pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot;
087        this.bolusId = bolusId;
088    }
089
090    /**
091     * <table border="1">
092     * <caption>Byte layout for RemoteCarbEntryRequest.buildCargo(...):</caption>
093     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
094     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(carbs) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
095     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(carbs) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
096     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>(byte) unknown</code></td></tr>
097     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint32(pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
098     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>toUint32(pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
099     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>toUint32(pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
100     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>toUint32(pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
101     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
102     * <tr><td>8</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
103     * </table>
104     */
105    public static byte[] buildCargo(int carbs, int unknown, long pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot, int bolusId) {
106        return Bytes.combine(
107                Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(carbs),
108                new byte[]{(byte) unknown},
109                Bytes.toUint32(pumpTimeSecondsSinceBoot),
110                Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId)
111        );
112    }
113
114    /**
115     * <table border="1">
116     * <caption>Parsed fields for RemoteCarbEntryRequest:</caption>
117     * <tr><td><code>carbs</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 0)</code></td></tr>
118     * <tr><td><code>unknown</code></td><td><code>raw[2]</code></td></tr>
119     * <tr><td><code>pumpTime</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 3)</code></td></tr>
120     * <tr><td><code>bolusId</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 7)</code></td></tr>
121     * </table>
122     */
123    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
124        raw = removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(raw);
125        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size(), "size " + raw.length);
126        this.cargo = raw;
127        this.carbs = Bytes.readShort(raw, 0);
128        this.unknown = raw[2];
129        this.pumpTime = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 3);
130        this.bolusId = Bytes.readShort(raw, 7);
131    }
132
133    public int getCarbs() {
134        return carbs;
135    }
136
137    public long getPumpTime() {
138        return pumpTime;
139    }
140
141    public int getBolusId() {
142        return bolusId;
143    }
144}
